step.tex: \int \left(2x - 3\cos x + e^x\right)dx \\ \qquad\qquad\quad= \int 2x\,dx -\int 3 \cos x\,dx +\int e^x\,dx \\ \qquad\qquad\quad=\dfrac{2x^2}{2} - 3\sin x + e^x +C\\ \qquad\qquad\quad= x^2 - 3\sin x + e^x + C \\ \text{Here, C is the constant of integration}
